attributes.action: Ban people living in towns owning more than one vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the government sort the transport system properly ie. reliable buses, trains etc... there should be no need for people in towns to own cars, because  if the public transport was cheap and reliable enough then people would use it, cutting down congestion considerably

The government let everyone having a vote on fox hunting, so lets let everyone have a vote on people in towns not owning vehicles
